Job Description: Comprehends all aspects of digital marketing to create and accomplish cross platform strategies.Good command of English.Experience in the industry with published blog posts, speaking engagements, active tweets, etc.Data driven and can analyse and suggest through analytics for future development.Develop and maintain social media profiles on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn.Knowledge in SEO, SEM, blogging and business analytics.Should be able to deliver results through ethical search engine optimization techniques.Need Excellent presentation, verbal, and writing skills.Monitor and Report Website traffic and source analytics.Ability to analyze data, draw conclusions, execute recommendations and implement remedies.
